statement.p: In 36.11 of the last 36 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{36}}={0.3611}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{36}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3611}\cdot{36}={12.9996}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 36-12.9996=23.0004 We round that as requested to 23.
